isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING PROTECTION AND DIAGNOSTIC SYSTEM (APAds™) DESCRIPTION, OPERATION, TROUBLESHOOTING, REMOVE, INSTALL, AND ELECTRICAL CIRCUIT DIAGRAMS MAINTENANCE MANUAL - INSTALL - HIGH OR LOW SIDE PRESSURE SWITCHES

svcproc.title: HIGH OR LOW SIDE PRESSURE SWITCHES
svcproc.para: The high or low side pressure switches stall procedures are in the following steps.

step1.para: Perform the install procedures of the high or low side pressure switches in accordance with the GROUP 16-AIR CONDITIONING BASIC THEORY, SYSTEM DIAGNOSIS AND SERVICE in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual. The location of the high or low side pressure switches is different for each truck model.

note.para: Pressure switches cannot be installed on the wrong refrigerant port. The high side switch has a M-10 pressure port housing, the low side switch has a M-12 pressure port housing.

step1.para: Turn vehicle ignition to the ON position.
